document_data.name: ''Bane''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bane''''' was a [[weapon quality|quality]] that could be added to magical weapons. They excelled at striking and doing greater injury to foes of a particular racial type.
document_data.Creation:
In order to forge a ''bane'' weapon, the creator must have ''[[summon monster I]]'' available. 

This quality could be temporarily applied to weapons by means of the [[transmutation]] [[spell]], ''[[bane weapon]]''.{{Cite dragon/279/Revenge of the Spider Queen}}
document_data.Notable''Bane'' Weapons:
* ''[[Fatal Touch]]'', the favored weapon of [[Kelemvor]].<ref>
* ''[[Cormyrian goblinthrasher]]'', a weapon that allowed its wielder to better fight goblins.
